1148827446682525834.Text: Meralyn Othan's brother. He was found dead, just like the others.

2206382451871429663.Text: You've heard about my brother? It's hard to imagine he's gone. All would be well if he hadn't fallen in with Eno Romari and those End of Times lunatics. Sevil was a lonely man, a bit lost, but he was hardly stupid. It was that cult that caused his death!
